page.title: 13THE ALMSHOUSES AND BEVERLIE
page.content: The Almshouses were built by Sir Roger Manwood in 1567.Mrs Field,aged 83, a parishioner for 42 years now lives there. {Pupils'comments.}Angela:"Mrs Field lives in a house which is 418 years old and she has a cat which is 6 years old.Her husband was in the Police.She has money given to her.It has a strange name.It is called faggot money." (Heating allowance from the Vicar.) Stewart:"She looks through the window in the morning and watches us go to School". Jamin:"There might have been a ghost there because every night she shut all the doors,and in the morning they were all open!" {The Beverlie}Once the Warden's House it was leased by the Trustees fifty years ago,and now has about 700 customers weekly.Their favourite drink is bitter.
